captions.text:
OK, this morning we
are going to show you

how to do what I call
a wrap around pony.

And just to speed up
the video a little bit,
I have already prepped her hair.

You can see on the front
I have divided or parted

her hair in the front, and then
I've just done a French braid

and braided it all the way
to the very end of her hair.
So as long as I can get it.

And I've done that on
both sides, you can see.

So she has two little French
braids, running braids.

And if you don't know
how to do a French braid,

I have another video
that you can look at
to learn how to do that.

So now I'm just going to take
her hair, the rest of it.

I like to wet it
down just because I

think it holds in
place a little better.

And I'm going to comb it
back into a pony tail.

I'm going to leave the
braids out of the ponytail.

Just kind of comb all
those wispies back in

and secure it with
a rubber band.

OK, so now you have
your pony secured.
Now bring your braids back.

And I'm going to cross
them over the top

so they hide that
little rubber band,

and then I'm going to cross
them underneath again.

And just do that as
many times as I can.

And then underneath, I'll
have to secure-- get that one

hair back there-- with a
rubber band to hide it.

And what you get is
just a little bit

of a laced up effect
on the ponytail,

just kind of a fun,
different little look.

title: French Wrap-Around Ponytail | Cute Girls Hairstyles
